name: RPS Puzzle
description:
Rock Paper Scissors Puzzle is a simple addictive game!

If you like puzzle games such as classic Tetris, this game is for you. Based on the popular rock, paper, scissors game, "RPS Puzzle" is a novel game in which you need to stack figures and eliminate the stack by placing a figure that beats the figure on the top, you know the drill:

"Rock" beats "Scissors"
"Scissors" beats "Paper"
"Paper" beats "Rock"

HOW TO PLAY?

1.- Stack figures and eliminate them in order to get points
2.- You get more points the more figures you eliminate in a single stack
3.- Every certain number of points the level increases, and with that the falling speed
4.- No time limits
